Producer: Parag Desai, Ajay Devgan, Deepak Dhar, Sapna Malhotra, Siddartha P. Malhotra, Rishi Negi
Production Co: Ajay Devgn Ffilms, Banijay Asia, Alchemy Productons
Synopsis: Tribhanga is an Odissi dance pose that is asymmetrical, yet mesmerizing and sensuous, so much like the lives of the three women characters of the film -- Nayan, Anu and Masha.
Title: Tribhanga: Tedhi Medhi Crazy
